Articles.Content:
This is going to be my WIP, and all other pre-release mods thread.

For my first mod, a Dromoman extension, with hub caps and a small KAS winch designed to fit on the end of a Dromoman arm.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Took me most of an afternoon and evening to do this, and I'm pretty pleased at them. Constructive criticism would be helpful

DOWNLOAD

License is CC Attribution non-commercial CC-BY-NC.

Edited June 5, 2014 by Robotengineer
added license.
Nice hub cap. Does it fit on the stock wheels?
As it is that the stock wheels don't have attach nodes, they won't though you could probably change the .cfg to be able to add them.
